column4: can anyone tell me why my bios password is not working?? Actually i have put passwd in bios for booting operating system but my system is not demandin any passwd. And operating is booting without demanding any password.????
do you have to enable it seperately from actually setting the password?
when i enter bios there are 2 passwd options one is supervisor passwd and another is user passwd. But my system is not demandin any passwd for booting.

I'm no BIOS expert, it was just a thought.  Have a look and see if you need to enable it as well as enter passwords.  Also Nallep's suggestion seems wise - try chenging something harmless and see if next time you reboot it is still there or if ti has changed back
